title: 现在怎么才能找到一个好玩的服务器呢？
author: zxczly
txt_content:
有些服主赚完钱就跑人了
有些服务器开一段时间就不开了
听说出了国服了？

replies.author: RinAfter
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

等我六级发服务器
这波满分

replies.author: learm
replies.txt_content: 自己开一个服务器就好了！不过要当良心腐竹，，，

replies.author: learm
replies.txt_content:
didixiong 发表于 2016-10-26 14:07
我这开了大型的服务器，要来不？什么类型都有
你不一妹子吗》》》》
还来宣传服务器，，，，，

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
服务器版块好玩的很多啊 也挺丰富的 去那里找可能会找到哦





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
